forecast.name: Overnight
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly cloudy, with a low around 54. West southwest wind around 10 mph.

forecast.name: Friday
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly sunny. High near 66, with temperatures falling to around 64 in the afternoon. West southwest wind 8 to 21 mph, with gusts as high as 25 mph.

weather_report:
As the afternoon sun begins its gentle descent, the cityscape of San Francisco basks in a retreating veil of mostly cloudy skies. The atmosphere is serene, with an inviting chill given the lingering marine layer, a reminder of the ocean's embrace. Temperatures hover comfortably, transitioning from a crisp yet pleasant 66 to a mild 64 as the day wanes. A soft breeze from the west southwest whispers through the streets, occasionally picking up to a lively gust, making it a delightful moment to stroll along the waterfront.

This is a day that beckons one to explore local delights—perhaps a quiet read at a café adorned with succulents, where the aroma of freshly brewed coffee dances with the invigorating coastal breeze. For those inclined to venture out, layered clothing will serve well; a light jacket or sweater adds a touch of comfort against the cool air. The conditions are not overtly foggy, but the hints of an ever-present marine influence provide a unique backdrop for a leisurely afternoon. Wander through the twists of the city’s hilly terrain or indulge in artisan food markets, where the flavors of the local cuisine craft a perfect complement to the mood of the day.
